info.title: Fragment Resolver
info.description:
To get the fragment content in a specified document with valid DTD.

See general methodology at Krauss & Lima (2003) and LexML standards v1.0 at Lima & Ciciliati (2008).  Basic syntax, two flavors:
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/okfn-brasil/trazdia/master/docs/assets/fragId-syntax-diagram/fig1.png)

See OKBr (2017) for more details.

### References

* Krauss & Lima (2003) *"Notação Canônica para a Citação de Trechos de Normas Estatutárias Jurídicas Brasileiras"*, http://www.nilc.icmc.usp.br/til/til2003/poster/krauss_Lima2.pdf

* Lima & Ciciliati (2008) *"LexML Brasil, Parte 3 – LexML XML Schema"*, http://projeto.lexml.gov.br/documentacao/Parte-3-XML-Schema.pdf

* OKBr (2017), http://git.ok.org.br/trazdia/blob/master/docs/fragId.md

get.summary: Retrieve the XML content of the fragment.
get.description: Retrieves the specified document's fragment. Status 404 occurs when document not exists. Status 405 when  fragment not exist.

404.description: has not found the input docId or fragId.

416.description: document's DTD not compatible with fragment standards.
